attributes.action: Make stolen valour illegal in the uk
attributes.additional_details: It is dishonest and quite frankly insulting to the name of current and ex servicemen and women. Arrest and charge those bringing the insult and dishonour to people that actually had the courage to sign up.
attributes.background: Bring the law from the US to stop people claiming to be ex and current service members.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action:

Make "Stolen Valour" a Criminal Offence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/716765
